title: OPOS Cookbook : 5 minute magic
description: OPOS (One Pot One Shot) is a cleaner, greener, healthier, tastier way to cook almost any food. OPOS recipes work exactly the same way for anyone, anywhere, anytime. This is the OPOS promise. This promise is tested everyday at thousands of homes. Each recipe is continuously tested and refined by OPOStars across the world. Their validations are recorded everyday at the Facebook groups OPOS School and OPOS support group. These groups offer 24x7 support and hand holding for anyone interested to learn OPOS.
author: Ramakrishnan B
